name: coolify
description: Coolify is an open-source alternative to Heroku and Netlify designed for self-hosters. It provides an easy-to-use UI for deploying applications, databases, and static sites on your own infrastructure using Docker or Kubernetes.
features: Heroku Alternative: Deploy apps with the same ease as Heroku. No vendor lock-in.
One-Click Deployments: Launch applications, databases, and sites instantly. Simplified deployment process.
Docker & Kubernetes: Support for both container orchestration platforms. Choose your stack.
Git Integration: Automatic deployments from GitHub, GitLab, and Bitbucket. CI/CD built-in.
Database Management: Deploy and manage PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, and more. Complete stack solution.
Self-Hosted: Run your own PaaS on any infrastructure. Full control, zero monthly fees.
